title: This Studio Looks at Bellybuttons…
summary: Generating design school course abstracts for anything you want.

text.value: Studying in a design school is not without its ups and downs. As students, what gets our blood pressure high and anxiety pumping to 11 are class sign-up days and the nightmarish thought of not getting the course we want. Will I be stuck doing something I don’t want to do for one month? I very well may.
But what exactly are we getting when we think we want something? The other problem
Design school course abstracts are often just that; too abstract.
